actions.name: Earth Eater

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Ground-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Ground-Type attack.

Effect: The user ignores the damage and effects of the triggering attack and recovers 4 Ticks of HP.

system.description:

Effect: The user ignores the damage and effects of the triggering attack and recovers 4 Ticks of HP.
